---
title: '확률과 통계1 과제 1 - 20192208 김형훈'
---



## 1



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
x <- seq(5.0, -11.0, -0.3)
x
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
 [1]   5.0   4.7   4.4   4.1   3.8   3.5   3.2   2.9   2.6   2.3   2.0   1.7
[13]   1.4   1.1   0.8   0.5   0.2  -0.1  -0.4  -0.7  -1.0  -1.3  -1.6  -1.9
[25]  -2.2  -2.5  -2.8  -3.1  -3.4  -3.7  -4.0  -4.3  -4.6  -4.9  -5.2  -5.5
[37]  -5.8  -6.1  -6.4  -6.7  -7.0  -7.3  -7.6  -7.9  -8.2  -8.5  -8.8  -9.1
[49]  -9.4  -9.7 -10.0 -10.3 -10.6 -10.9
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
y <- x[length(x):1]
y
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
 [1] -10.9 -10.6 -10.3 -10.0  -9.7  -9.4  -9.1  -8.8  -8.5  -8.2  -7.9  -7.6
[13]  -7.3  -7.0  -6.7  -6.4  -6.1  -5.8  -5.5  -5.2  -4.9  -4.6  -4.3  -4.0
[25]  -3.7  -3.4  -3.1  -2.8  -2.5  -2.2  -1.9  -1.6  -1.3  -1.0  -0.7  -0.4
[37]  -0.1   0.2   0.5   0.8   1.1   1.4   1.7   2.0   2.3   2.6   2.9   3.2
[49]   3.5   3.8   4.1   4.4   4.7   5.0
```


:::
:::



## 2



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
x <- c(seq(3, 6, length.out=5), rep(c(2, -5.1, -33), 2), 7 / 42 + 2)
x
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
 [1]   3.000000   3.750000   4.500000   5.250000   6.000000   2.000000
 [7]  -5.100000 -33.000000   2.000000  -5.100000 -33.000000   2.166667
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
y <- x[c(-1, -length(x))]
y
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
 [1]   3.75   4.50   5.25   6.00   2.00  -5.10 -33.00   2.00  -5.10 -33.00
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
z <- sort(x, decreasing = TRUE)
z
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
 [1]   6.000000   5.250000   4.500000   3.750000   3.000000   2.166667
 [7]   2.000000   2.000000  -5.100000  -5.100000 -33.000000 -33.000000
```


:::
:::


## 3



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
A <- matrix(c(4.3, 3.1, 8.2, 8.2, 3.2, 0.9, 1.6, 6.5), 4, 2)
A
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
     [,1] [,2]
[1,]  4.3  3.2
[2,]  3.1  0.9
[3,]  8.2  1.6
[4,]  8.2  6.5
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
B <- rbind(c(4.3, 3.2), c(3.1, 0.9), c(8.2, 1.6), c(8.2, 6.5))
B
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
     [,1] [,2]
[1,]  4.3  3.2
[2,]  3.1  0.9
[3,]  8.2  1.6
[4,]  8.2  6.5
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
A[, 2] <- sort(A[, 2])
A
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
     [,1] [,2]
[1,]  4.3  0.9
[2,]  3.1  1.6
[3,]  8.2  3.2
[4,]  8.2  6.5
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
for (n in 1:ncol(A)) {
  A[, n] <- sort(A[, n])
}
A
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
     [,1] [,2]
[1,]  3.1  0.9
[2,]  4.3  1.6
[3,]  8.2  3.2
[4,]  8.2  6.5
```


:::
:::



## 4



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
df <- data.frame(
  person=c("Stan", "Francine", "Steve", "Roger", "Hayley", "Klaus"),
  sex=factor(c('M', 'F', 'M', 'M', 'F', 'M')),
  funny=factor(c('High', 'Mid', 'Low', 'High', 'Mid', 'Mid'), levels=c('Low', 'Mid', 'High'), ordered=TRUE)
)
str(df)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
'data.frame':	6 obs. of  3 variables:
 $ person: chr  "Stan" "Francine" "Steve" "Roger" ...
 $ sex   : Factor w/ 2 levels "F","M": 2 1 2 2 1 2
 $ funny : Ord.factor w/ 3 levels "Low"<"Mid"<"High": 3 2 1 3 2 2
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
df['gpa'] <- c(3.5, 3.5, 3.0, 4.1, 2.8, 3.9)
df
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
    person sex funny gpa
1     Stan   M  High 3.5
2 Francine   F   Mid 3.5
3    Steve   M   Low 3.0
4    Roger   M  High 4.1
5   Hayley   F   Mid 2.8
6    Klaus   M   Mid 3.9
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
yo <- df[substr(df$person, 1, 1) == 'S', ]
yo
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
  person sex funny gpa
1   Stan   M  High 3.5
3  Steve   M   Low 3.0
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
df['sex'] <- ifelse(df['sex'] == 'M', 0, 1)
df
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
    person sex funny gpa
1     Stan   0  High 3.5
2 Francine   1   Mid 3.5
3    Steve   0   Low 3.0
4    Roger   0  High 4.1
5   Hayley   1   Mid 2.8
6    Klaus   0   Mid 3.9
```


:::
:::



## 5



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
sortMatrix <- function(A) {
  for (n in 1:ncol(A)) {
    A[, n] <- sort(A[, n])
  }
  return (A)
}

mat <- matrix(c(4.3, 3.1, 8.2, 8.2, 3.2, 0.9, 1.6, 6.5), 4, 2)
mat <- sortMatrix(mat)
mat
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
     [,1] [,2]
[1,]  3.1  0.9
[2,]  4.3  1.6
[3,]  8.2  3.2
[4,]  8.2  6.5
```


:::
:::



## 6



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
df <- data.frame(quakes)
str(df)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
'data.frame':	1000 obs. of  5 variables:
 $ lat     : num  -20.4 -20.6 -26 -18 -20.4 ...
 $ long    : num  182 181 184 182 182 ...
 $ depth   : int  562 650 42 626 649 195 82 194 211 622 ...
 $ mag     : num  4.8 4.2 5.4 4.1 4 4 4.8 4.4 4.7 4.3 ...
 $ stations: int  41 15 43 19 11 12 43 15 35 19 ...
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
mean(df$mag)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 4.6204
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
median(df$mag)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 4.6
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
tab <- table(df$mag)
which(tab == max(tab))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
4.5 
  6 
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
summary(df$mag)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
   Min. 1st Qu.  Median    Mean 3rd Qu.    Max. 
   4.00    4.30    4.60    4.62    4.90    6.40 
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
var(df$mag)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 0.1622261
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
sd(df$mag)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 0.402773
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
IQR(df$mag)
```

```
[1] 0.6
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
cv <- sd(df$mag) / mean(df$mag)
cv
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 0.08717275
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
table(df$mag)
```

```

  4 4.1 4.2 4.3 4.4 4.5 4.6 4.7 4.8 4.9   5 5.1 5.2 5.3 5.4 5.5 5.6 5.7 5.9   6 
 46  55  90  85 101 107 101  98  65  54  47  43  29  21  20  14   9   8   2   3 
6.1 6.4 
  1   1 
```

barplot(table(df$mag))
```

hist(df$mag, breaks = x_grid1, col='blue', xlab='리히터규모', ylab='빈도')
```
